svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_1) AppleWebKit/604.3.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/11.0.1 Safari/604.3.5" version="7.6.7" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram id="542feaca-9fd2-7265-ab33-2f8b9ea5669c" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Luma pixel values of a frame

switch.text: Luma pixel values of a frame

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 146px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
Use learned model
for blocks size 8x8
to predict
angular modes [2, 33]
for all the 8x8 CUs
in the frame, prediction results are stored in a map for later access

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 236px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
For CUs of size 8x8 or 16x16 or 32x32, add
1. top-16 predictions 2. Planar Mode
3. DC Mode
to a list for rough mode decision (RMD);
For CUs of other sizes,
original flow in HTM-16.2 is applied

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 66px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Add mode 34 to RMD list since it has the same angle with mode 2

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 146px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
Use learned model
for blocks size 16x16
to predict
angular modes [2, 33]
for all the 32x32 CUs
in the frame, prediction results are stored in a map for later access

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 146px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
Use learned model
for blocks size 16x16
to predict
angular modes [2, 33]
for all the 16x16 CUs
in the frame, prediction results are stored in a map for later access

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 144px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 144px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 144px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 266px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
Slope Range construction for the current CU:
Denote the number of the top-1 mode from the model prediction as Ntop-1, a slope range will be constructed using the angular modes
within (Ntop-1-8, Ntop-1+8), where the two boundaries are exclusive.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 196px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
In DMM1 coarse searching, skip the wedgelets which have the slopes out of the Slope Range constructed in the above step.
DMM1 Refinement is unmodified.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
RDO
to obtain the best mode

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 26px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 39px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 156px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: SATD to obtain 3 candidates for CU of size 8x8 and 16x16, obtain 2 candidates for CU of size 32x32
